name: command-line-args
description: A mature, feature-complete library to parse command-line options.

scripts.docs: jsdoc2md index.js > doc/API.md && jsdoc2md lib/definition.js > doc/option-definition.md
scripts.cover: istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/test-runner test/*.js && cat coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/.bin/coveralls && rm -rf coverage; echo
